languages.text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Первое использование каждой силы навигатора в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (10): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (6): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: First use in combat of every Navigator power costs −1 less AP. Castigating 10: enemies targeted by Navigator powers gain a −10 penalty to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of Navigator powers. Infusing 6: Allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 Willpower +15 Perception

First use in combat of every Navigator power costs −1 less AP. Castigating 10: enemies targeted by Navigator powers gain a −10 penalty to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of Navigator powers. Infusing 6: Allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 Willpower +15 Perception

The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: 每场战斗中，首次使用尚未使用过的导航者能力时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（10）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低10点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（6）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有属性{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高6点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗中，首次使用尚未使用过的导航者能力时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（10）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低10点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（6）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有属性{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}提高6点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: 戦闘時に初めて使用するすべての航宙士の力は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が-1される。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}（10）：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10が付与される。このペナルティは累積し、同じ敵が航宙士の力の標的となるたびに更新される。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}6：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての特性に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+6を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+20増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+15増加
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に全ての航宙士の力を初めて行使する際には{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を1消費する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}10：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての能力に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10が付与される。このペナルティは累積し、同じ敵が航宙士の力の標的となるたびに更新される。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}6：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての能力に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}＋6を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が20増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が15増加

languages.text: El primer uso de un poder de navegante cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (10): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (6): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +6 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: El primer uso de un poder de navegante cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (10): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (6): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +6 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Первое использование каждой силы навигатора в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (10): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (6): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Первое использование каждой силы навигатора в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 10: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} 6: союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

Первое использование каждой силы навигатора в бою требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 10: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} 6: союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigatorkraft im Kampf kostet −1 weniger {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (10): Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, haben bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} (6): Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +6 auf sämtliche Eigenschaften. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Der erste Einsatz jeder Navigatorkraft im Kampf kostet -1 weniger {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} 10: Gegner, die von Navigatorkräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften. Dieser Abzug wird jedes Mal aufaddiert und erneuert, wenn derselbe Gegner zum Ziel von Navigatorkräften wird. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchdringen{/g} 6: Verbündete, die Ziel von Navigatorkräften sind, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Navigators einen +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf alle ihre Eigenschaften. Dieser Bonus wird jedes Mal, wenn er aufaddiert wird, bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: La première utilisation de chaque pouvoir de navigateur au combat coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (10) : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur sont soumises à une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du navigateur. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusion{/g} (6) : les caractéristiques des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur bénéficient d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +6 jusqu'à la fin du prochain tour du navigateur. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +20 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: La première utilisation de chaque pouvoir de navigateur au combat coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (10) : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur sont soumises à une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du navigateur. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusion{/g} (6) : les caractéristiques des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur bénéficient d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +6 jusqu'à la fin du prochain tour du navigateur. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +20 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

La première utilisation de chaque pouvoir de navigateur au combat coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (10) : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur sont soumises à une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 jusqu'à la fin du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du navigateur. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusion{/g} (6) : les caractéristiques des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs de navigateur bénéficient d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +6 jusqu'à la fin du prochain tour du navigateur. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +20 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: Her Rotacı gücünün ilk kullanımı 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Kırbaçlayıcı{/g} (10): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Aşılayıcı{/g} (6): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm niteliklerine +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}
languages.original_text: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
